The Boy Who Harnessed the Wind

Ano: 2019

IMDb ID: tt7533152

Classificação: 7.6

Sinopse: William Kamkwamba was born in the country of Malawi, in Africa. When he was fourteen years old, a terrible drought hit the village where he lived. People had nothing to eat. Being an excellent student and very fond of physics, William decides to save his native village from starvation. In the library he finds books on physics. After studying the books, he got an idea to build a wind generator, to provide electricity to his family.—Peter-Patrick76 (peter-patrick@mail.com)
